Today in the Hebrides, surf is on at 3 ft @ 10s WSW with fresh 16 mph SSE winds. Europie and Barvas are your best bets, offering clean conditions during their prime tides. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 5 ft @ 12s W and light 6 mph SSW winds, making for a fun day at spots like Europie and Dalbeg. Day after, surf holds at 4 ft @ 11s W with moderate 15 mph SSW winds, still workable at the same spots. Best: tomorrow.
